tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
a minute ago
Returned to his Clinic after a decade or more, but Dr. Prakash Tekwani is still the jovial comforting dentist who any patient scared of dental work needs. He comforts you with his pace of work and a patient ear. Dr. Nimisha and Dr. Poonam also who worked on my problems have a patient approach and great at comforting you when it is sensitive while the work is on your teeth. Highly recommended for swift and comfortable dental work

tags: None
review:
A+++ very nice treatment ..Dr.Nimisha Shah is really great with her work , I am very happy with her work and dedication she showed during my treatment and also the extra amount of attention she gave to my case...I am very pleased with all her efforts ...
I would highly recommend Dr.Nimisha Shah ...Thank you so much

tags: None
review: I had an excellent experience with Dr. Nimisha. On all occasions, she put me at ease. Thanks to the positivity emanating from her, I almost did not feel the pain. She was approachable and always available on calls and messages, even on Sundays. I would highly recommend her for all types of dental problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nimisha Shah did an excellent job. The whole staff made the visit a comfortable experience. Thank you
